item.title: My morning with the President of China
item.author: Eleanor C Johnstone,
item.description: On Wednesday, Imperial was honoured to welcome President Xi Jinping of the People’s Republic of China. The trip to the College was part of a four day visit to the UK, which was the first state visit by a Chinese leader in ten years. In addition to visiting Imperial, the President also met with Prime …

item.title: Amersham overrun by pumpkins
item.author: Eleanor C Johnstone,
item.description: On Saturday 21st February 2015, the Recreational Clubs Committee held its annual Night Hike, a team orienteering-style competition held at night in the countryside around London, open to all students, staff and alumnus of Imperial. This year the competition returned to its original base of Amersham, …
